text:
Four boys – aged between 10 and 15 years – reportedly ran away from the Government Children Home for Boys, Ranipet during the late hours of Wednesday.

The boys were residents of Polur and Cheyyar taluks in Tiruvannamalai.

On finding the boys missing from the home, the home’s superintendent informed their parents.

He also lodged a complaint with the Ranipet police.

It is suspected that the boys ran away from the home after damaging the fencing.

A search has been launched to trace them, the police said. - Staff Reporter
title: Four boys escape from government home
